name: Sales Forums
description: Discussions and news from sales communities.
selectionPrompt: Pick discussion threads with concrete scripts, metrics, or objection handling examples. Prefer many substantive comments. Skip vague advice and venting.
essencePrompt: Discussion synthesis (80–120 words): tactic in one line, when it works, one metric/example, one caveat, and a next step to try.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑liners from comments when possible: 1) Script snippet or angle, 2) Objection/anti‑pattern, 3) Measurement tip. If none: 'No meaningful perspectives found.'
